verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764> for the sons <WH1121> of Korach <WH7141>, A Song <WH7892> upon Alamoth <WH5961>. 'Elohim <WH430> is our refuge <WH4268> and strength <WH5797>, a very <WH3966> present <WH4672> <WH8738> help <WH5833> in trouble <WH6869>.

Therefore will not we fear <WH3372> <WH8799>, though the earth <WH776> be removed <WH4171> <WH8687>, and though the mountains <WH2022> be carried <WH4131> <WH8800> into the midst <WH3820> of the sea <WH3220>;
Though the waters <WH4325> thereof roar <WH1993> <WH8799> and be troubled <WH2560> <WH8799>, though the mountains <WH2022> shake <WH7493> <WH8799> with the swelling <WH1346> thereof. Selah <WH5542>.

There is a river <WH5104>, the streams <WH6388> whereof shall make glad <WH8055> <WH8762> the city <WH5892> of 'Elohim <WH430>, the holy <WH6918> place of the tabernacles <WH4908> of Ha `Elyon <WH5945>.
'Elohim <WH430> is in the midst <WH7130> of her; she shall not be moved <WH4131> <WH8735>: 'Elohim <WH430> shall help <WH5826> <WH8799> her, and that right <WH6437> <WH8800> early <WH1242>.
The heathen <WH1471> raged <WH1993> <WH8804>, the kingdoms <WH4467> were moved <WH4131> <WH8804>: he uttered <WH5414> <WH8804> his voice <WH6963>, the earth <WH776> melted <WH4127> <WH8799>.
The YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> is with us; the 'Elohim <WH430> of Ya`akov <WH3290> is our refuge <WH4869>. Selah <WH5542>.
Come <WH3212> <WH8798>, behold <WH2372> <WH8798> the works <WH4659> of the YY <WH3068>, what desolations <WH8047> he hath made <WH7760> <WH8804> in the earth <WH776>.

He maketh wars <WH4421> to cease <WH7673> <WH8688> unto the end <WH7097> of the earth <WH776>; he breaketh <WH7665> <WH8762> the bow <WH7198>, and cutteth <WH7112> the spear <WH2595> in sunder <WH7112> <WH8765>; he burneth <WH8313> <WH8799> the chariot <WH5699> in the fire <WH784>.

Be still <WH7503> <WH8685>, and know <WH3045> <WH8798> that I am 'Elohim <WH430>: I will be exalted <WH7311> <WH8799> among the heathen <WH1471>, I will be exalted <WH7311> <WH8799> in the earth <WH776>.
The YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> is with us; the 'Elohim <WH430> of Ya`akov <WH3290> is our refuge <WH4869>. Selah <WH5542>.
